sources.title: Roaring Six Guns (1937) KERMIT MAYNARD
sources.description:
Stars: Kermit Maynard, Mary Hayes, Sam Flint
 Director: J.P. McGowan

 Sinclair has a government lease on range land that is about to expire. George Ringold wants the land and hires Roberts and his men. But they turn out to be a gang of killers and trouble soon arises.

metadata.Plot: Sinclair has a government lease on range land that is about to expire. George Ringold wants the land and hires Roberts and his men. But they turn out to be a gang of killers and trouble soon arises.
